meanings.definition: Not interacting or having any effect on each other.
meanings.sent1: The two noninteracting magnets did not attract or repel each other.
meanings.sent2: The noninteracting chemicals remained separate in the solution.
meanings.sent3: The noninteracting neighbors lived side by side without ever speaking to each other.
meanings.sent4: The noninteracting stars in the galaxy shone brightly but never collided.
meanings.sent5: The noninteracting particles in the experiment stayed in their own lanes, unaffected by the others.

meanings.definition: Not engaging in communication or interaction with others.
meanings.sent1: The noninteracting student preferred to work alone in class.
meanings.sent2: The noninteracting coworker rarely joined in on office conversations.
meanings.sent3: The noninteracting cat ignored its owner's attempts to play with it.
meanings.sent4: The noninteracting clouds floated silently across the sky, not acknowledging each other.
meanings.sent5: The noninteracting siblings sat at the dinner table in silence, lost in their own thoughts.
